text: Blerta Shala (born 3 December 1998) is a Kosovar footballer who plays as a midfielder and has appeared for the Kosovo women's national team. ==Career== Shala has been capped for the Kosovo national team, appearing for the team during the 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup qualifying cycle. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Kosovan women's footballers Category:Kosovo women's international footballers Category:Women's association football midfielders Category:KFF Mitrovica players Category:KFF Hajvalia players
title: Blerta Shala
